LanguageData.Megascarab.label: Megascarab
LanguageData.Megascarab.description: A large, genetically-engineered beetle. What was once the worker caste of an artifical ecosystem of insectoids designed to fight Mechanoid invasions, it is now usually seen without its deadlier insectoid cousins. Still, its size and hard shell make it dangerous when it attacks. An eusocial creature, it cannot reproduce individually.
LanguageData.Megascarab.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Spelopede.label: Spelopede
LanguageData.Spelopede.description: A medium-sized bioengineered bug the size of a sheep. The spelopede is the middle caste of a hive, taking care of most work tasks as well as fighting with its claws.
LanguageData.Spelopede.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Megaspider.label: megaspider
LanguageData.Megaspider.description: Not actually a spider, the megaspider is a genetically-engineered giant insectoid the size of a bear. Designed for heavy work and combat, its thick chitinous armor makes it hard to kill, while its long deadly ripper-blades make it deadly.
LanguageData.Megaspider.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Scorpion.label: Scorpion
LanguageData.Scorpion.description: Scorpions are predatory arachnids with eight legs. The two frontal legs consist of a pair of sharp, grasping claws. They have a segmented tail that ends with a venomous stinger.
LanguageData.Scorpion.tools.1.label: head
